textBeforeTable: Additional Details: (Passes to the Aspen Club & Spa can be obtained from any Frias Properties front desk during regular business hours.) All Frias Properties of Aspen guests receive complimentary passes to the Aspen Club & Spa, the valley’s premier full-service spa and workout facility. During ski season the Silverglo complex provides shuttle transportation to downtown Aspen and the gondola. Complex amenities at the Silverglo include on-site check in and front desk services, on-site laundry, heated pool, sauna, ski lockers, free on-site parking, free Aspen airport transfers, free wireless internet and an on-site group gathering room. Unit amenities include an open living area, dining area and kitchen with hardwood floors, a wood-burning fireplace and a deck with views of Aspen Mountain. The master bedroom suite features an en suite master bathroom, a sitting area, a stone wood-burning fireplace and a private entry. This two level 5-bedroom, 3-bath standard townhouse is only four blocks to the Silver Queen Gondola and downtown Aspen, and features a stone fireplace and open living area. Silverglo Condo Complex: Contact Us
textAfterTable: Property Location: Check-in Location: 940 Waters Avenue Reviews for Silver-Glo #207 Average Rating: 5 of 5 1 of 1 reviews "Property Manager Cam Murray went above and beyond to make our tr" 5 of 5 We spent a wonderful few days at the Silver-Glo Unit 207. The 5 bedroom condo splept our party of 8 extremely comfortable. This was my first time in Aspen and the property manger Cam Murray was amazing! We arrived after hours, but he promptly had the keys to us and gave our group a tour of the property. He continually went out of his way suggesting reasturants, outdoor opportunities, and the best nightlife hot spots. The property and Cam Murray made this a trip our group will never forget. Read Advanced Review -Denver Group on 01/08/2009
